item.title: January 8th, 2018 --- Quote of the Week: -------------- "You don't always need a plan. Sometimes, you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens!"

Cable Subscribers!! --------------- You will be receiving a text message this week to schedule an update to your Kodi box. Please respond to the number provided in the text message to set up an appointment. Thank you for your patience while we continue to work to improve your Kodi experience!
